NK037(ji)019:1: // rnam sras drag po rta sngon can gyi sgrub thabs dbang chog dang bcas pa bzhugs /
NK037(ji)019:3: rgyal ba rnams kyi bstan srung mchog /
NK037(ji)019:4: rnam mang thos sras drag po yi //
NK037(ji)019:5: sgrub thabs rjes gnang cho ga ni //
NK037(ji)019:6: dang po'i las can don du bshad //
NK037(ji)019:7: 'dir gnubs lugs rnam sras drag po rta sngon can
NK037(ji)019:8: gyi sgrub thabs dang 'brel bar rjes gnang gi cho
NK037(ji)019:9: ga sgrub pa la gsum ste /
NK037(ji)019:10: sbyor ba yo byad kyi gshom /
NK037(ji)019:11: dngos gzhi sgrub pa'i thabs dang /
NK037(ji)019:13: dang po yo byad bsham pa ni /
NK037(ji)019:14: stegs bu dug khrag gis byugs pa la /
NK037(ji)019:15: man+dala me ri dang dur khrod thod pa'i ra ba
NK037(ji)019:16: rnams kyis zlum por bskor ba'i dbus su 'khor lo
NK037(ji)019:17: sngon po rtsibs bzhi pa lte ba mu khyud dang
NK037(ji)019:18: bcas pa'i nang du gru gsum mthing nag tu bris
NK037(ji)019:19: pa'am / bsdu na 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa tsam
NK037(ji)019:20: gyis kyang chog ste gang ltar yang lha gnas su
NK037(ji)019:21: pa'am / tshom bu bkod / der many+dzi la rten
NK037(ji)019:22: gtor gru gsum nag po sha khrag sogs kha zas
NK037(ji)019:23: bzang pos brgyan pa la mda' dar dmar po sku
NK037(ji)019:25: mdun du 'bul gtor dang sman raka /
NK037(ji)019:26: mtha' mchod pa rnams kyis bskor /
NK037(ji)019:27: ral gri dang rdor dril sogs 'og tu dgos pa thams cad tshogs par bsham mo //
NK037(ji)019:28: gnyis pa sgrub pa'i thabs ni /
NK037(ji)019:30: mchod pa sbyi dang khyad par ba rnams byin gyis brlab /
NK037(ji)019:31: gsang ba'i bdag po'i bdag bskyed sngon du 'gro bas /
NK037(ji)019:33: rang gi snying ga'i h'u las 'od zer 'phros pas
NK037(ji)019:34: mdun gyi nam mkhar gnam lcags 'bar ba'i tsh+wa tsh+wa
NK037(ji)019:35: 'khrug pa'i sa gzhi la rdo rje'i ra gur gyi
NK037(ji)019:36: dbus su / sprin nag 'khrug pa'i rlung gi dkyil
NK037(ji)019:37: 'khor gyi steng la thod pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal yas
NK037(ji)019:38: khang dur khrod chen pos yongs su bskor ba /
NK037(ji)019:39: de'i dbus su b+h+r+aum las 'khor lo sngon po rtsibs
NK037(ji)019:40: bzhi pa ral gri'i phreng bas bskor ba'i dbus su
NK037(ji)019:41: chos 'byung gru gsum mthing nag gi lte bar ru
NK037(ji)019:42: dra pho mo'i gdan la h'u yig mthing nag /
NK037(ji)019:43: de las 'od 'phros dgra bgegs thams cad tshar bcad /
NK037(ji)019:44: tshur 'dus yongs su gyur pa las rgyal po chen
NK037(ji)019:45: po sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa
NK037(ji)019:46: / dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gnyis dgra bgegs la sdang mig tu blta ba /
NK037(ji)019:47: mche ba gtsigs shing khro gnyer bsdus pa /
NK037(ji)019:48: sma ra dang smin ma 'bar ba /
NK037(ji)019:49: phyag g.yas ral gri me 'bar ba 'phyar zhing /
NK037(ji)019:50: g.yon mda' dar le brgan phrag par bkal ba /
NK037(ji)019:51: sku la dar nag gi ber chen bswe khrab smug po dang bcas pa gsol ba /
NK037(ji)019:52: dbu la lcags kyi rmog zhwa gser gyi thig le can mnabs pa /
NK037(ji)019:53: zhabs la sag lhwam yu ring can gsol ba /
NK037(ji)019:54: rta mchog sngon po nyams rtsal dang ldan pa gser
NK037(ji)019:55: gyi sga dang phra men gyi yo ba can chibs
NK037(ji)019:56: pa / sbrul dang mi mgos brgyan cing 'jigs rung
NK037(ji)019:57: srin po'i cha lugs can me rlung 'tshubs ma'i dbus
NK037(ji)019:58: pa / na bzhugs pa'o // de'i thugs kar nyi ma la bee yig nag po /
NK037(ji)019:59: phyi rol rtsibs bzhi'i shar du zhe sdang 'o mtshor
NK037(ji)019:60: trag las bdud mo gshin rje mgo dgu ma nag
NK037(ji)019:61: mo spu gri dang thod khrag bzung nas ba men
NK037(ji)019:63: lhor nga rgyal mar khu'i mtshor raka las bdud mo
NK037(ji)019:64: gshin rje lag brgya ma g.yas pa lnga bcus ral
NK037(ji)019:65: gri dang g.yon pa lnga bcus bdud zhags bzung nas
NK037(ji)019:67: nub tu 'dod chags khrag mtshor sha las bdud mo
NK037(ji)019:68: 'phung khrol ma dmar nag g.yas lcags kyu dang g.yon
NK037(ji)019:69: dgra snying bzung nas g.yag rgod nag po la chibs
NK037(ji)019:70: pa / byang du phrag dog gser mtshor b+h+yo las
NK037(ji)019:71: bdud mo gsod byed ma ljang nag g.yas lnga na
NK037(ji)019:72: pa / khram shing / g.yon lnga na bdud zhags
NK037(ji)019:73: glo snying dang bcas pa bzung nas rkyang bu kha
NK037(ji)019:75: thams cad kyang 'jigs shing rngams pa'i chas can rang mdog gi bud med 'bum 'bum gyis bskor ba /
NK037(ji)019:77: shar lhor d+h+ri las yul 'khor srung dkar po pi wang bzung nas glang po che la zhon pa /
NK037(ji)019:78: lho nub tu bee las 'phags skyes po sngon po ral gri bzung nas ma he la zhon pa /
NK037(ji)019:79: nub byang du pi las mig mi bzang dmar po
NK037(ji)019:80: sbrul zhags dang mchod rten bzung ba chu srin la
NK037(ji)019:81: zhon pa / byang shar du bee las ngal bsol
NK037(ji)019:82: po ljang nag dbyug tho dang ne'u le bzung nas
NK037(ji)019:84: thams cad kyang go cha gsol zhing cher khros pa
NK037(ji)019:85: pho nya drag gtum bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshogs
NK037(ji)019:86: kyis bskor ba'o // rang gi snying ga nas 'od
NK037(ji)019:87: zer 'phros ye shes sems dpa' badz+rahsa m+aa dzah h'u
NK037(ji)019:88: kyis bskor ba'o // / ri rgyal lhun po'i byang phyogs nas //
NK037(ji)019:89: lcang lo can gyi pho brang nas //
NK037(ji)019:91: chos skyong rgyal po rnam thos sras //
NK037(ji)019:92: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang //
NK037(ji)019:93: 'gro ba'i don du sku sprul pa //
NK037(ji)019:94: khyod ni dmag dpon chen po ste //
NK037(ji)019:95: gnod sbyin bye ba'i dmag dang bcas //
NK037(ji)019:96: ma mo gnod sbyin gshin rje'i tshogs //
NK037(ji)019:97: dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i don slad du //
NK037(ji)019:98: 'khor dang bcas te gshegs su gsol //
NK037(ji)019:99: bee traka rak+sha b+h+yohs ma ya dzah dzahmh'u bam hoh zhes pas spyan drangs /
NK037(ji)019:101: yab gcig rgyal po rnam thos bu //
NK037(ji)019:102: ma mo la sogs 'khor gyis bskor //
NK037(ji)019:103: kun gyi yab gcig dpal 'bar ba //
NK037(ji)019:104: dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol //
NK037(ji)019:105: h'u bee traka rak+sha b+h+yohs ma ya ti sh+tha lhan /
NK037(ji)019:108: dpal ldan mgon po rnam thos sras //
NK037(ji)019:109: thugs rjes phongs pa las sgrol ba //
NK037(ji)019:110: phrin las rdzogs mdzad dpa' bo che //
NK037(ji)019:112: h'u bee trag rak+sha b+h+yoha ti p+au hoh prat+ai ts+tsha hoh zhes pas phyag bya /
NK037(ji)019:114: yon chab me tog spos dang mar me dang //
NK037(ji)019:115: dri mchog zhal zas spyan gzigs sna tshogs dang //
NK037(ji)019:116: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos la sogs //
NK037(ji)019:117: chos skyong 'khor dang bcas la mchod par 'bul //
NK037(ji)019:118: h'u bee traka rak+sha b+h+yoh sa ma ya hoh gzhan yang khyad par rmad du byung ba yi //
NK037(ji)019:119: sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga sbyar dam tshig rdzas //
NK037(ji)019:120: sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma chang dang bcas //
NK037(ji)019:121: ru dra bsgral ba'i tsit+ta mchod par bzhes //
NK037(ji)019:122: h'u bee traka rak+sha b+h+yohsarba pany+tsa a mri ta kh+aa hi /
NK037(ji)019:123: dgra bgegs tsit+ta la kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK037(ji)019:126: lha tshogs dbugs 'byin lha min 'joms la dpa' //
NK037(ji)019:127: mi bzad bdud kyi cha lugs bstan pa skyong //
NK037(ji)019:128: byang phyogs rgyal po bdud rgyal rnam thos sras //
NK037(ji)019:129: 'khor bcas sprul pa yang sprul tshogs la bstod //
NK037(ji)019:132: rgyal po 'khor bcas kyi thugs kar nyi ma la gnas pa'i h+aum yig sngags kyis bskor ba /
NK037(ji)019:133: bdag gi thugs ka'i 'od kyis bskul bas ci 'dod
NK037(ji)019:134: pa'i phrin las thogs med du sgrub par bsam la
NK037(ji)019:135: / bee sh+ra ma na ya h'u s+w+aa h+aa /
NK037(ji)019:136: trag rak+sha b+h+yoh zhes bzla ba man ngag zhal gdams kyi yig chung na yod /
NK037(ji)019:137: bee traka rak+sha b+h+yoh zhes pa rgyun bzlas kyi snying
NK037(ji)019:138: po 'bru drug pa ma mo ltar sgrub pa'i snying
NK037(ji)019:140: drag sngags gzhan mang du yod kyang 'dis chog go //
NK037(ji)019:142: rlung me thod pa'i sgyed bu la gnas pa'i a
NK037(ji)019:143: las ka p+aa lar bcud sha lnga bdud rtsi lngar
NK037(ji)019:144: gnas pa la rang gi snying ga'i 'od kyis gnod
NK037(ji)019:145: byed thams cad bkug ste thim pas sha khrag gi
NK037(ji)019:146: gtor ma 'dod yon gyi phung por bsam la /
NK037(ji)019:148: a k+aa ros byin gyis brlab /
NK037(ji)019:150: ma h+aa ba ling+ta ma h+aa p+au dza kha kha kh+aa hi kh+aa hi /
NK037(ji)019:151: zhes pa bdun gyis phul la /
NK037(ji)019:152: chos skyong rgyal po rdzu 'phrul can //
NK037(ji)019:153: khyod kyi mthu stobs bsam mi khyab /
NK037(ji)019:154: sde bo che la stobs po che //
NK037(ji)019:155: 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan //
NK037(ji)019:156: de la bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
NK037(ji)019:157: de ring bdag gi mgon la byon //
NK037(ji)019:158: rgyan gyi gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
NK037(ji)019:159: dam nyams dgra bgegs rdul du rlog /
NK037(ji)019:160: shin tu gdung bas khyod bskul na //
NK037(ji)019:161: ma g.yel chos skyong thugs dam can //
NK037(ji)019:162: sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs la //
NK037(ji)019:163: rdzu 'phrul mthu yi dngos grub stsol //
NK037(ji)019:165: rjes chog ni snga ma rnams dang 'dra'o //
NK037(ji)019:166: gsum pa rjes gnang gi cho ga ni /
NK037(ji)019:167: bdag mdun gyi sgrub mchod sngar ltar byas nas /
NK037(ji)019:171: 'di nyid spyir btang gi grags tshod nang ma mo ltar sgrub par ngos bzung na yang /
NK037(ji)019:172: don du gsang ba gshin rje ltar sgrub par ngos bzung na 'thad de /
NK037(ji)019:173: 'khor gyi bdud mo bzhi dang gshin rje mo bzhi yang ming gi 'bod phyogs tsam yin pas na /
NK037(ji)019:174: des na 'dir gsang sgrub drag po rta sngon can
NK037(ji)019:175: gnubs lugs kyi rjes gnang zab mo sgrub pa la
NK037(ji)019:177: gnod sbyin gter skyong rin chen lta bu'i sku //
NK037(ji)019:178: che mchog bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan rdzogs //
NK037(ji)019:179: sgrub mchog bdag la mchog dang thun mong gi //
NK037(ji)019:180: dngos grub ma lus dus 'dir stsal du gsol //
NK037(ji)019:181: lan gsum gyis gsol ba btab /
NK037(ji)019:182: rgyun bshags gang rung gis tshogs bsag /
NK037(ji)019:183: de nas slob ma la phyag rdor gyi mngon rtogs phog /
NK037(ji)019:184: gtor ma mdun bskyed bzhin gsal btab nas spyan 'dren dang mchod bstod bya /
NK037(ji)019:185: lcags kyi rdo rje spyi bor bzhag la /
NK037(ji)019:186: 'di ni ye shes rdo rje ste //
NK037(ji)019:187: sangs rgyas thams cad kun gyi bdag /
NK037(ji)019:188: dregs pa spyi yi gnyen po mchog /
NK037(ji)019:189: khyod la bdag gis deng 'dir bskur //
NK037(ji)019:190: ma h+aa a b+hi shiny+tsa tu m+aam +aahmh'u s+w+aa h+aa /
NK037(ji)019:191: zhes dregs pa spyi 'dul gyi dbang bskur /
NK037(ji)019:192: slob ma phyag rdor du gsal ba la gtor ma gtad de /
NK037(ji)019:193: gtor ma'i lha las rgyal chen gnyis pa zhig chad /
NK037(ji)019:194: slob ma'i snying gar thim lus dang grib ma'i tshul du bzhugs par mos la /
NK037(ji)019:195: bee traka rak+sha b+h+yohs ma ya sid+d+hi dzahmh'u bam hoh 'di ni rgyal po chen po ste //
NK037(ji)019:196: sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba dang //
NK037(ji)019:197: dgra bgegs 'dul zhing brlag mdzad pa //
NK037(ji)019:198: las kun sgrub pa'i dbang bskur sbyin //
NK037(ji)019:199: k+aa ya sid+d+hi sogs brjod cing bka' bgo drag tu bya /
NK037(ji)019:200: ral gri lag tu gtad la /
NK037(ji)019:201: chos skyong rgyal po 'khor bcas rnams //
NK037(ji)019:202: gdul dka' sna tshogs 'dul mdzad pa //
NK037(ji)019:203: shin tu gtum pa'i khro tshul gyis //
NK037(ji)019:204: ma lus dgra bgegs tshar chod cig /
NK037(ji)019:205: ma h+aa a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)019:207: rdo rje dang ral gri lhan cig phyar du bcug ste /
NK037(ji)019:208: yi dam gyi spro ba lnga'am drug bya bar gsungs pas dmigs pa 'di ltar mdzod /
NK037(ji)019:209: khyed rang phyag na rdo rje'i nga rgyal brtan pos /
NK037(ji)019:210: zhabs kyis gdugs pa can gyi gtso bo'i snying gar mnan nas gzir /
NK037(ji)019:211: phyag g.yas kyi rdo rje las 'od thog lta bu 'phros /
NK037(ji)019:213: ba spu'i bu ga nas khro chung mang po spros /
NK037(ji)019:214: bskal pa'i rlung lta bus gdug pa can gtor /
NK037(ji)019:215: ba spu'i bu ga nas me phung spros pas gnod byed thams cad bsregs /
NK037(ji)019:216: rgyan gyi sbrul las gdug pa'i kha rlangs 'phros /
NK037(ji)019:217: ma rungs pa rnams myos shing brgyal /
NK037(ji)019:218: gsung rig sngags kyi sgras 'jig rten gang bas gdug
NK037(ji)019:219: pa can btul bar bsams la sngags lhan cig bzla
NK037(ji)019:220: bar zhu / zhes phyag rdor gyi sngags bzlas la dmigs pa gsal gdab /
NK037(ji)019:221: chos skyong gi spro ba gsum gyis dgra bgegs tshar gcod pa'i mos pa 'di bzhin mdzod /
NK037(ji)019:222: rgyal po'i sku stod las bya gcan gyi tshogs spros pas sa bla'i gdug pa can btul /
NK037(ji)019:223: sked pa nas gnod sbyin dang srin po spros pas sa steng gi gdug pa can btul /
NK037(ji)019:224: sku smad nas stag dang sbrul spros pas 'og gi
NK037(ji)019:225: gdug pa can rnams btul bar mos la sngags 'di
NK037(ji)019:227: bee sh+ra ma n+aa ya a nu r+aa tsa ku ru h'u /
NK037(ji)019:228: zhes dpon slob gnyis kas bzlas la dmigs pa gsal 'debs su bcug /
NK037(ji)019:229: dpon slob gnyis ka'i snying gar nyi ma la h'u /
NK037(ji)019:230: bla ma'i thugs ka'i 'od kyis mdun bskyed bskul /
NK037(ji)019:231: de'i thugs ka nas sngags phreng byung ba'i 'od kyis phrin las mdzad /
NK037(ji)019:232: sngags phreng dang 'dres pa slob ma'i khar zhugs snying
NK037(ji)019:233: ga'i sa bon gyi mthar 'khod par bsams la slob
NK037(ji)019:234: dpon gyi bgrang phreng la bzung ste /
NK037(ji)019:235: gong gnon dang rtsa ba'i snying po gsum mam bdun gyi rjes zlos bya /
NK037(ji)019:236: de nas slob ma la 'di'i rjes zlos byar gzhug /
NK037(ji)019:237: 'dod pa'i khams na longs spyod pa'i //
NK037(ji)019:238: dngos grub bdag gis kun thob nas //
NK037(ji)019:239: bla ma yi dam dkon mchog mchod //
NK037(ji)019:240: phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs par shog /
NK037(ji)019:243: man+dala sogs slob ma'i rjes chog dang /
NK037(ji)019:244: mdun bskyed kyi rjes chog gong du bstan pa bzhin bya'o //
NK037(ji)019:245: gsang sgrub 'di la gshin rje khram thogs kyi rgyud
NK037(ji)019:246: sogs bal po ba su d+ha ra nas gnubs chen
NK037(ji)019:247: la brgyud pa'i bka' ma la sku mdog nag po
NK037(ji)019:248: dang / gnyal ba nyi she'i gter ma la gzhan 'dra ba las sku mdog dmar por byed /
NK037(ji)019:249: spyir gter ma'i skor la phyi lha ltar sgrub pa /
NK037(ji)019:250: nang ma mo ltar sgrub pa /
NK037(ji)019:251: gsang ba gshin rje ltar sgrub pa /
NK037(ji)019:252: yang gsang mkha' 'gro ltar sgrub pa zhes grags pa'i dang po ni /
NK037(ji)019:253: ser chen sprin gseb ma'i skor yin /
NK037(ji)019:254: gnyis pa dmar po bdud mo bzhi skor la ngos 'dzin /
NK037(ji)019:255: gsum pa mdung dmar can rtsa sgrub rta sngon ma yin zer /
NK037(ji)019:256: bzhi pa ni phyag mtshan bzhi par grags pa yin ces 'dod /
NK037(ji)019:257: 'on kyang thog mtha' gnyis don la gnas mod /
NK037(ji)019:258: mdung dmar can rta sngon nang sgrub dang /
NK037(ji)019:259: gshin rje ma mo bzhi skor 'di gsang sgrub yin
NK037(ji)019:260: par nges zhes bla ma nyid gsung ba don la
NK037(ji)019:261: gnas so // rnam 'gyur rab 'jigs thogs med mthus //
NK037(ji)019:262: rdo rje theg pa'i bstan skyong zhing //
NK037(ji)019:263: gdug can tshar gcod rgyal chen gyi //
NK037(ji)019:264: sgrub thabs snying po'i bcud du dril //
NK037(ji)019:265: rnam sras drag po rta sngon ma'i sgrub thas kyi
NK037(ji)019:266: le'u tshan gter chen 'gyur med rdo rje'i gsung sgrub
